[[Image:Shire Calendar 1982.jpg|thumb]]

'''Shire Calendar 1982''' was produced by [[Steve Pillinger]], and there are two versions available: A4 size and A3 (297 x 420 mm) size (pictured at the right). Both are in black and white.
